title: Atley and Friends
subtitle: 2. Help when you can.
story_theme: Little animals' learning to treat others with kindness.
guidance: Use soft colors and warm tones. Make each animal expressive and friendly. Atley is a cub bear, its friends can be a cute cat, a cute dog, a cute rabbit, and a cute bird. The setting is a sunny forest with trees, flowers, and a clear blue sky. The style is whimsical and child-friendly.
